name: Big Boy: Compton Style
description:
Set in an alternate universe where hip-hop reigns true and gangs rules the Isles, only one man is clever enough to spit bars: Spookarius "Big Boy" Brown.

Play in a fantasy world that is influenced and driven by hip-hop and rapping, from trying to save your monarch from international cuckolds to battling members of the Wu-Tang Clan, Big Boy: Compton Style delivers humor and action, along with some terribly horrifying jokes!

ALL BUGS AND/OR QUESTIONS: sellfishgames@gmail.com

Credits to /u/drune30 for cover art!
